import React, { useState } from "react"; import { FaStar, FaRegStar, FaEye, FaTrash, FaEllipsisV, FaMapMarkerAlt } from 'react-icons/fa'; import { inspectionData } from './InspectionList'; // import the inspection list import ThermalImageUpload from "./ThermalImageUpload"; const statusColors = { 'In Progress': 'bg-green-100 text-green-700', 'Pending': 'bg-red-100 text-red-700', 'Completed': 'bg-purple-100 text-purple-700', }; export default function TransformerInspectionDetails({ transformer, onBack }) { const [showThermal, setShowThermal] = useState(false); const [selectedTransformer, setSelectedTransformer] = useState(null); // Filter inspections for this transformer const inspections = inspectionData.filter(ins => ins.no === transformer.no); return (
{/* Transformer header */}
{transformer.no}
{transformer.region} {transformer.locationDetails}
{transformer.pole}
Pole No
102.97
Capacity
{transformer.type}
Type
{inspections.length}
No. of Feeders
Last Inspected Date: {inspections[0]?.inspected || '-'}
{/* Conditional Rendering: Show Thermal Image Upload OR Inspection Table */} {showThermal && selectedTransformer === transformer.no ? ( ) : (

Transformer Inspections

{inspections.map((insp, i) => ( ))}
Inspection No â†“ Inspected Date Maintenance Date Status
{i === 0 ? : } {insp.inspectionNo} {insp.inspected} {insp.maintenance} {insp.status}
)}
); }
